data.title: Pay Water Bill
data.text:
Paying Your Water Bill Online

To pay your water bill online, please visit our online payment portal.

Paying Your Water Bill Over the Phone

You may submit payment via credit card over the phone by calling City Hall at 912-756-3345.

Paying Your Water Bill by Mail

To pay your water bill by mail, please send a check or money order, made payable to City of Richmond Hill, to P.O. Box 250, Richmond Hill, GA 31324.

You can also bring your payment to the City Hall Dropbox, located in the traffic circle next to our City Hall building.

Disconnected Water

If your water has been disconnected for non-payment and a payment is made through our online payment portal, please notify us by calling City Hall at 912-756-3345.

After-Hours Water Emergency

If you are experiencing a water emergency after business hours, please call 912-421-2034.
